name: @nottu/render
description: Render engine for Nottu PostMaker using Puppeteer and Satori

scripts.build: npm run clean && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --sourcemap --target=node18 --outdir=dist --external:@nottu/* --external:puppeteer --external:satori --external:@resvg/resvg-js --external:sharp && npm run types
